Side Effects: Rarely will get a warm tingling feeling about 4 hours after ingestion but usually stops after 30 mintes.  Appears to be the flushing effect of niacin..
Comments: My cardiologist suggested this medication to reduce LDL and increase HDL.   It has worked for the LDL_ reducing it from 125 to 90 mg/dl.  The HDL has stayed the same at 45 mg/dl.  Also this drug is not on my insurance formulary_ so not sure if I need it_ A normal statin alone might do the same thing_ and be a whole lot cheaper.
